cancel_conversation: Maybe it's not the right time for this. Let's try again later!
log_repeat_prompt: Do you want to log more work?
reading_failed: Something went wrong while reading the file!
upload_prompt: Can you upload a file with the work logs?
upload_retry: You have to upload a file. Try again!
uploaded_multiple: Sorry, I can only handle one file at a time. Try again!
uploaded_unrecognized: Sorry, I only know how to read plain text files. Try again!
